CustomField.description: ... represents the customer-facing label to be used by a given field. This field should only be used for externalObject mappings -- as the Salesforce Object fields carry their own label.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ... represents the customer-facing label to be used by a given field. This field should only be used for externalObject mappings -- as the Salesforce Object fields carry their own label.
CustomField.label: Field Label
